# AwaitableEventGroup&lt;T&gt;.TrySetCanceled method

Attempts to transition the underlying task into the Canceled state.

```csharp
public virtual bool TrySetCanceled()
```

## Return Value

True if the `AwaitableEventGroup` was successful; otherwise, false.
